name: react-native-htmlview
description: A component which renders HTML content as native views

scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run jest
scripts.lint: ./format.sh --list-different; if [ $? != 0 ]; then echo "CODE FORMATTING: please run 'yarn format' and commit the changes"; exit 1; fi
scripts.release: npm publish .; git push && git push --tags # yarn publish is often broken

author: James Friend <james@jsdf.co> (http://jsdf.co/)
